data.eml:eml: Two new species of the Aenictuswroughtonii species group (Hymenoptera, Formicidae, Dorylinae) from Thailand

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jaitrong, Weeyawat, Ruangsittichai, Jiraporn (2018): Two new species of the Aenictuswroughtonii species group (Hymenoptera, Formicidae, Dorylinae) from Thailand. ZooKeys 775: 103-115, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.775.26893, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.775.26893
